tasks.title: Foundation & Infrastructure
tasks.description: Phase 1: Foundation & Infrastructure - Duration: 10-12 days, Complexity: Medium (6/10)
tasks.details: This phase focuses on foundation & infrastructure with an estimated duration of 10-12 days and Medium (6/10) complexity.
tasks.testStrategy: Complete all tasks in this phase and verify functionality.

subtasks.title: Project Initialization & Environment Setup
subtasks.description: Initialize Git, Next.js project, configure development environment
subtasks.details:
Estimated hours: 4, Complexity: Low (3/10)

Subtasks:
1. Initialize Git repository and GitHub setup
2. Create Next.js 14+ TypeScript project structure
3. Set up pnpm/npm workspace configuration
4. Configure ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript configs
5. Create development Docker configuration
6. Set up environment variable management
7. Initialize basic folder structure
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all subtasks are completed and functionality works as expected.

tasks.title: Core Features & Social Media Integration

tasks.details: This phase focuses on core features & social media integration with an estimated duration of 12-14 days and High (8/10) complexity.
tasks.testStrategy: Complete all tasks in this phase and verify functionality.
